actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Shasta-Trinity National Forest, California, as the Mt. Shasta Wilderness, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Shasta-Trinity National Forest in California as wilderness, to be administered by the Secretary of Agriculture.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Shasta-Trinity National Forest, California, as the Mt. Shasta Wilderness, and for other purposes.
